00018 void
00019 UpdateAddName(struct SyncUpdateData *ud, struct ccn_charbuf *name) {
00020     // add the name (use copy), build the node as soon as the rules apply
00021 }
00022 
00023 struct SyncNodeComposite *
00024 CacheEntryFetch(struct SyncUpdateData *ud, struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ce) {
00025     // causes the node to be swapped in
00026     if (ce == NULL) return NULL;
00027     if (ce->ncL != NULL) return ce->ncL;
00028     if (ce->ncR != NULL) return ce->ncR;
00029     if (ce->state & SyncHashState_fetching) return NULL;
00030     if (ce->state & SyncHashState_local) {
00031         // preferentially do the local fetch
00032     }
00033     if (ce->state & SyncHashState_remote) {
00034         // initiate the transfer
00035         ce->state |= SyncHashState_fetching;
00036     }
00037     return NULL;
00038 }
00039 
00040 struct ccn_charbuf *
00041 BestName(struct SyncUpdateData *ud) {
00042     // returns the best current name from the updates
00043     struct ccn_charbuf *best = ud->lagName;
00044     if (best == NULL) {
00045         if (ud->ixBase->len > 0) {
00046             struct SyncNameAccum *src = (struct SyncNameAccum *) ixBase->client;
00047             int j = IndexSorter_Best(ud->ixBase);
00048             best = src->ents[j].name;
00049             ud->lagName = best;
00050         }
00051     }
00052     return best;
00053 }
00054 
00055 int
00056 AdvanceName(struct SyncUpdateData *ud) {
00057     // advances to the next best current name
00058     // skips duplicates
00059     struct SyncNameAccum *src = (struct SyncNameAccum *) ixBase->client;
00060     for (;;) {
00061         struct ccn_charbuf *best = BestName(ud);
00062         IndexSorter_Rem(ud->ixBase);
00063         ud->lagName = NULL;
00064         if (ud->ixBase->len <= 0) break;
00065         int j = IndexSorter_Best(ud->ixBase);
00066         struct ccn_charbuf *next = src->ents[j].name;
00067         if (next == NULL) break;
00068         ud->lagName = next;
00069         if (SyncCmpNames(best, next) != 0) return 1;
00070     }
00071     return 0;
00072 }
00073 
00074 int
00075 AcceptNode(struct SyncUpdateData *ud) {
00076     // accepts the remainder of nodes/names in the current node
00077     // if the accums at lower levels are empty, then share this node
00078     // (likely to be tricky code)
00079 }
00080 
00081 int
00082 BuildTree(struct SyncUpdateData *ud,
00083           struct SyncTreeWorkerHead *tw,
00084           struct SyncNameAccum *src) {
00085     int res = 0;
00086     while (res == 0) {
00087         struct SyncTreeWorkerEntry *ent = SyncTreeWorkerTop(tw);
00088         if (ent == NULL) break;
00089         struct SyncHashCacheEntry *ce = ent->cacheEntry;
00090         if (ce == NULL)
00091             // no cache entry, so bad news
00092             return -__LINE__;
00093         struct SyncNodeComposite *nc = CacheEntryFetch(ud, ce);
00094         if (nc == NULL) {
00095             if (ce->state & SyncHashState_fetching)
00096                 // can't process this node now, it's being fetched
00097                 return 0;
00098             return -__LINE__;
00099         }
00100         struct ccn_charbuf *name = BestName(ud);
00101         enum SyncCompareResult scr = SyncNodeCompareMinMax(nc, name);
00102         switch (scr) {
00103             case SCR_before:
00104                 // name < Min(L), so add name, advance names
00105                 UpdateAddName(ud, name);
00106                 AdvanceName(ud);
00107                 break;
00108             case SCR_min:
00109                 // name == Min(L), advance names
00110                 AdvanceName(ud);
00111                 break;
00112             case SCR_max:
00113                 // R == Max(L), discard R, advance both
00114                 ent->pos++;
00115                 AdvanceName(ud);
00116                 break;
00117             case SCR_after:
00118                 // R > Max(L), advance L
00119                 AcceptNode(ud);
00120                 break;
00121             case SCR_inside:
00122                 // Min(L) < R < Max(L), so dive into L
00123                 if (SyncTreeWorkerPush(tw) == NULL)
00124                     return - __LINE__;
00125                 break;
00126             default:
00127                 // this is really broken
00128                 return -__LINE__;
00129         }
00130     }
00131 }
